title: Bab Bhar Mosque
text:
Bab Bhar Mosque , also known as Ez-Zraariâ Mosque is a <a href="mosque">mosque</a> in <a href="Tunis">Tunis</a>, <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a>.
Localization.
It is located in the east side of the <a href="Medina%20of%20Tunis">old town of Tunis</a>, in the Helket Ez-Zitoun impasse, near Bab Bhar.
History.
This mosque was built by <a href="Ahmed%20Ibn%20Marzouk%20Ibn%20Abi%20Omara%20Mousseilli">Ahmed Ibn Marzouk Ibn Abi Omara Mousseilli</a> in 1282.
It has been restored between 1969 and 1973.
